head.title: Lady Liberty Quarter? Naaah. Four Real Noo Yawk Coins.

series.series.name: NEIGHBORHOOD REPORT: NEW YORK UP CLOSE

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Banking, Finance and Insurance

hedline.hl1: Lady Liberty Quarter? Naaah. Four Real Noo Yawk Coins.

abstract.p: Drawings by Stuart Goldenberg of four alternates to Statue of Liberty design that New York's commemorative quarter will feature

block.p: New York's commemorative quarter, to be issued next year, will feature the Statue of Liberty, it was announced this month. A special quarter is being issued for each state. Not to be outdone, and in New York's true spirit of diversity and disputation, Stuart Goldenberg, whose illustrations frequently appear in The City, made four alternative designs. These indigenous symbols are our own two bits' worth.
